chinese.remoteUnavailable: 目前無法連線取得線上解析，以下為基礎解讀。
chinese.remoteEmpty: 暫無線上解牌結果，以下為基本解析。
chinese.shareTitle: Tarot Insight 解牌師 - 占卜重點
chinese.shareDefault: Tarot Insight 解牌師 - 歡迎體驗完整的解牌流程。
chinese.emailSubject: Tarot Insight 解牌師｜我的解牌報告
chinese.appDescription: 從提問、牌陣推薦、抽牌到解牌報告，一次完成的塔羅占卜體驗。
chinese.questionSectionDescription: 輸入你的問題，我們會為你分析主題並推薦最適合的牌陣。
chinese.questionLabel: 你想探索的問題是什麼？
chinese.questionPlaceholder: 範例：我和伴侶未來的發展如何？
chinese.spreadSectionDescription: 瀏覽牌陣資訊並開始抽牌。
chinese.readingSectionDescription: 依照牌陣位置逐一呈現每張牌的意義與洞察。
chinese.reportSectionDescription: 整理本次占卜的重點，方便儲存、分享或列印。
chinese.footerNote: Tarot Insight 解牌師 · 為心之所問提供清晰指引。
chinese.analysisSummary: 問題主題傾向：{categories}。已為你挑選最契合的牌陣。
chinese.readingSummaryMeta: 共 {count} 張牌 · 問題主題：{category}
chinese.reportCopyHeader: Tarot Insight 解牌師 - 解牌報告
chinese.reportShareHeader: Tarot Insight 解牌師 - 占卜重點

english.remoteUnavailable: Unable to retrieve online insights right now. Showing base interpretation.
english.remoteEmpty: No online interpretation is available yet. Showing base interpretation.
english.shareDefault: Tarot Insight Reader - Explore the full reading journey.
english.emailSubject: Tarot Insight Reader | My Tarot Report
english.appDescription: From question analysis to spread guidance, drawing, and reporting - a complete tarot journey.
english.questionSectionDescription: Share your question and we will analyze its theme to suggest the best spreads.
english.questionLabel: What would you like to explore?
english.questionPlaceholder: Example: How will my relationship with my partner develop?
english.spreadSectionDescription: Review the spread information and draw your cards.
english.readingSectionDescription: See each position's meaning and insight step by step.
english.reportSectionDescription: Summarize key messages for saving, sharing, or printing.
english.footerNote: Tarot Insight Reader · Guiding your heart with clarity.
english.analysisSummary: Dominant themes: {categories}. Here are your best-matched spreads.
